metadata.title: Chunk 3: CRM Portal
metadata.description: Verify the ticket in the CRM portal

steps.narration: Finally, let's verify the result in the CRM portal.
The ticket list now shows the billing dispute — created automatically during the conversation.
Category, priority, customer details, and resolution — all populated by the AI, fully auditable.
The complete Telegram conversation — every message, timestamp, and the AI's resolution — attached to the ticket for full compliance and quality review.
A thirty-dollar billing dispute, resolved end-to-end — from Telegram chat, through AI workflow orchestration, to a closed CRM ticket. No hold time, no transfers, no human agent.
